channel.title: Wtf? Everyone keeps getting black screened
channel.description:
I came on today... and added the thing for that if the owner logged in it would send a message to everyone saying that he had logged in..
Then when I restarted my server... EVERYONE got black screened... But they could still type and like look at the backpack and stats... just couldn't move... Anyone know whats wrong??
Oh yeah, I even took out the thing I put in... still doesn't work..
